mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_ID, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, LIKE_COUNT, MOVIE_ID, USER_ID, REVIEW_TITLE) VALUES ( SEQ_RENO.NEXTVAL, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, #{movieId}, #{userId}, #{reviewTitle})
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_ID, CONTENT, R.CREATE_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT MOVIE_TITLE FROM MOVIE M WHERE M.MOVIE_ID = R.MOVIE_ID) movieTitle ,USER_ID ,REVIEW_TITLE ,R.UPDATE_DATE ,NICKNAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_ID) WHERE REVIEW_ID=#{rno}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET CONTENT = #{content}, REVIEW_TITLE = #{reviewTitle}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REVIEW_ID = #{reviewId}
mapper.select:
SELECT REVIEW_ID ,MOVIE_ID ,NICKNAME ,VIEW_COUNT ,LIKE_COUNT ,R.CREATE_DATE ,REVIEW_TITLE FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_ID)
ORDER BY R.CREATE_DATE DESC
ORDER BY VIEW_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC

SELECT REVIEW_ID ,MOVIE_ID ,NICKNAME ,VIEW_COUNT ,LIKE_COUNT ,R.CREATE_DATE ,REVIEW_TITLE FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_ID)
WHERE REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE NICKNAME = #{keyword}
ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY VIEW_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY R.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT NICKNAME ,RC.CONTENT ,RC.CREATE_DATE ,RC.USER_ID "USER_ID" ,R.USER_ID "REVIEW_USER_ID" ,PRIVATE_YN FROM REVIEW_COMMENT RC JOIN MEMBER M ON(RC.USER_ID=M.USER_ID) JOIN REVIEW R USING(REVIEW_ID) WHERE REVIEW_ID = #{reviewId} ORDER BY R.CREATE_DATE DESC
